summary: An Ordinance annulling and repealing Ordinance No. 16702, entitled, "An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Stewart Street, in the City of Seattle, from First Avenue to Pike Place, by regarding the same and by paving the same with sandstone, and constructing granite curbs and concrete sidewalks, in accordance with Resolution No. 696 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle", and authorizing and directing the Board of Public Works to cancel any contract let in pursuance of said Ordinance.
